value.title: Get data from zip files without extracting them in Power Query
value.excerpt: In today‚Äôs video, I will show you how to unzip files in Power BI. You will be able to import multiple zip files in Power Query and unzip them without having to extract them first.  Here is Marks blog, where you can find his function: http://sql10.blogspot.se/2016/06/reading-zip-files-in-powerquery-m.html
